mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts (postId, uid, title, content, creationTime, imageId) VALUES(#{postId}, #{uid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{creationTime}, #{imageId});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY creationTime DESC WHERE uid = #{uid};
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY creationTime DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY creationTime DESC;
